name: Solanyx
description: Solanyx is an ecosystem on the Solana blockchain that aims to deliver a Gaming, NFTs and DeFi experience built around its token. In another dimension, in the Anunyx galaxy, is the planet Solidion. Until now, the highly intelligent Solanyx civilization has lived carefree on it. Right now, their planet is being attacked by a Zombie Ape army. They managed to escape and found safety on Solana blockchain where they were adopted by the humans.
